keyFacts: The document summarizes account activity for a Deutsche Bank account from May 1 to May 31, 2014.
Significant transfers totaling $14,100,000.00 were made to account 42952771 during this period.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2014, was $49,740,117.48.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for customer service related to the account.
The document includes details about service charges and interest payments.
